Message:
Since her ascension as the Pope,
Lady Elfriede had been terribly busy,
and the opportunities for us to meet
became few and far between.

She always shoulders
everything alone...
That really worries me.

And apparently, she didn’t seem
to be in good health when
she summoned Illya to see her
the other day.

And, there are times when
she speaks to herself...

Come to think of it,
I haven’t seen either Illya
nor Miss Loki as of late.
I wonder if something happened.

Then one day,
Lady Elfriede assembled
the Knights of Longinus,
and made a startling declaration.
